competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM
competitors.notes: Second largest market share, integrates with Office 365

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Enterprise CRM with Siebel acquisition integrated

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: Growing CRM player, market leader with ~35% share in certain segments

competitors.name: Pipedrive
competitors.notes: Founded in 2010, cost-effective CRM for sales teams

competitors.name: Nutshell
competitors.notes: Debuted in 2010 at Future of Web Design conference

context: By 2010, cloud CRM was mainstream. Salesforce dominated but faced competition from Microsoft and new SaaS players like Pipedrive.
